results.name: Bisection of A324650: a(n) = A000010(A276086(2*n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..15015
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
Index entries for sequences related to primorial numbers
program: A324650(n) = { my(i=0,m=1,pr=1,nextpr); while((n>0),i=i+1; nextpr = prime(i)*pr; if((n%nextpr), m *= (prime(i)-1)*(prime(i)^(((n%nextpr)/pr)-1)); n-=(n%nextpr));pr=nextpr); (m); };
A276086(n) = { my(i=0,m=1,pr=1,nextpr); while((n>0),i=i+1; nextpr = prime(i)*pr; if((n%nextpr),m*=(prime(i)^((n%nextpr)/pr));n-=(n%nextpr));pr=nextpr); m; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 10 2019
